name: Watch Out Grandma
description: Oh no! While rushing to work all of your stock options blew out the window! Your boss will be furious if you show up without them! Battle time to find as many stocks as possible. But wait! Members of the neighborhood and city block your path! Its not their fault they're in your way, but do you have the time to help them out? Or will you shove them aside to do your corporate overlord's bidding? (P.S. this is very incomplete in the extreme; you've been warned. Future updates will hopefully follow).
